transcript: one thing that you can give any human no matter what status they have is time all of them spend time doing things they don't want to do and so it's just what do those people spend time on that you could do if you're going after higher value targets they've already outsourced some of the lower level skills and so you have to find higher level skills that someone is spending time to do it and if you can replace that they will always buy their time back you just have to look at what they spend their time on and then say I will take a portion of it
